content.detailedDescription:
I was working at a gas station in houston tx. in 1980 and i looked up and saw a ufo it was a sphere at first coming straight at me and as it slowed down it turned into a diamond shape and then it was a diamond that was concave looking sides it happened so fast that when i said look at that it took off so fast it was gone in less then a second and when it took back off it went straight backwards at about a 22 1/2 degree angle from the original decent it didn't land it was out in the shy like i say it happened so fast that when i said look at that it disapered before anyone else saw it.

   about 3 to 6 months later my girlfriend "c.C." and myself was sitting in a field on the edge of houston one night on the hood of my car talking at watching the starts all of a sudden way out in space a bright light came on it got brighter and then dim and bright again then it looked like a shadow or something was moving down the light like someone walking down a stairs "c.C." said did you see that and i said no you were seeing things and she got mad i was joking with her the next day she said we ought to talk about what we seen but i blew her off i thought i was seeing things since i saw one earlier that summer and then 3 days later i ran into "a.F." and he said you won't believe what i saw 3 nights ago while driving down the interstate in north houston and i said wait don't say anything else let me tell you what i saw 3 nights ago and see if we saw the same thing so he shut up and listened as i told him what i saw in south houston the same night and when i was done "a.F." said yes that is what i saw to and i told him "c.C" and i was sitting in the field at the oil lease we work at at that night and we saw it to.
  i'm sure i was taken aboard a craft at least 2 times and they inplanted something in my nose and after it was there a few years it got infected and i pulled it out it was a very small piece of metal with some hairs hooked to it.I know i'm not crazy and this has been bothering me every since it happened. i'm not an artist but i could draw what i saw if need be.
                  "r.M."

i now live in northern michigan and don't know where the other 2 are
content.summary: 2 times over the summer of 1980 in houston tx 1 in daylight 1 at night.

content.detailedDescription: Nothing on this planet can go6-or 8 miles in 2 seconds-no sound hard to explain on paper witness "d.G." -classmate at the time
content.summary: Stationary-backed up went forward-few timesdisappeared in a second or 2

content.detailedDescription:
Myself, along with 2 friends were sitting near the top of a slag dump in town where we rode bikes and motorcycles one evening talking about the day and planning tomorrows ride. we heard a strange rumbling sound behind us a few hundred feet away and then the sound stopped. we turned around and observed a circular, disk shaped object with bright multi colored lighting, about 30 yards in diameter, rising from behind some trees. it climbed to an altitude of 500 to 1000 foot and silently passed overhead of us and proceeded about 1/4 mile in front of our view where we were sitting.  it hovered in that spot for about one minute as we sat there dazzled by what we were watching and then it shot straight up into the sky at an amazing speed and was gone from sight in less than 1 & 1/2 seconds.  we looked at each other and asked each other if we all saw that or was it just something we imagined.  it was clear that we all saw the same thing.  we left the area about 1/2 hour later after much discussion about what we saw and decided to keep it to ourselves for fear of ridicule.
the next morning we went back to the slag dump to ride bikes.  we had been riding in the area for years and knew the trails very well.  while riding along one trail where you had to make a sharp left and go down a little valley ( about 10 ft deep and 10 yards across that was 5 ft higher on the other side.  i went to take the left turn down the little dip and had to lay my bike down to keep from falling into what was now a very large and deep crevasse in the area.  it was now about 70 ft. deep and 50 yards to the other side. at first we thought it was mine subsidence, but what we found unexplainable was the trees and plants in the area didn't show any signs of it.  everything was upright as though it had been like that for years.  we retraced our steps several times and knew for sure we were in the right area and that something very very strange had happened here. we then reflected on what we had saw the night before.  it was the same area where we has seen the object rise from behind the trees. at that point we were pretty sure that what we had observed had something to do with it.
fast forward to a few weeks ago and i was looking at the area on google earth and a depression that approximates the size of the object we observed was visible in the ground where we observed the object arise from.  attached is a google earth photo of the area markings for where we were sitting when the event occured, where the object rose from, and where it hovered before shooting straight up into the sky.
i would be more than willing to take anyone to the area to look.
content.summary: Heard sounds from behind, object passed overhead, hovered, shot straight up.

content.detailedDescription:
Camping under the stars in appalachicola national forest, southwest of tallahassee, florida, was an unforgettable adventure for my dog, bear, and me.
on this particular night, january 15, 2000, we had been camping in appalachicola for several days when i decided to drive around a bit and see a little more of the woods.
at dusk, we followed a long trail off the main road, down a gravel road, bouncing along a dirt road until it came to an end, turning into two grassy footpaths.  the break in the woods was a little meadow, but looking up, the dark sky was expansive over the gulf of mexico.  the kind of sky that makes you feel real small.  a perfect setting for a close encounter with other-worldly neighbors.
about 9 or 10 p.M., as i was standing next to my car in quiet awe of nature's beauty, i saw a bright light suddenly appear in the west, darting around over the gulf.  mesmerized, i couldn't take my eyes off the single, unblinking light, which distinguished it from manmade aircraft of any kind.  it darted around, hovered awhile and moved on again, for 45 long minutes.  no earthly craft had such capabilities.  it was so close, i began to consider what might happen next.  my neck ached.  adrenaline surged through my body.  i moved the car into the cover of the woods without turning the lights on.
thoughts rushed through my mind...What if it lands in this meadow?  i pictured it hovering over my car and sucking us up like nectar.  i wondered if my dog would save us.  i wondered if they'd leave my dog behind if they took me.  
and i prayed they were friendly souls and not like the sci-fi aliens we've come to expect.  after all, these are highly evolved species of life.  how cruel could they be?  (crueler than we are?)
just as i was fully prepared to face whatever the night might bring, the craft darted off out of sight as quickly as it had appeared.  and i can't say i wasn't relieved to see it go, friendly or not.  of course, the memory will last my lifetime.  but that's a good thing.
* * *
content.summary: Darting lights over the gulf of mexico

content.detailedDescription: My father was stationed in california in the sixties,his mother had a heart attack and we were on the way home from oklahoma.I remember we were in the desert late at night,and i was in the back seat looking out at stars when one star   started to move over to a another star,back,and forth it went then stopped and the other star started doing the same thing.I told my parents but they ignored me, i watched this for what seemed forever and all of a sudden they took of in opposite directions.
content.summary: One object moved toward the other then moved backed, then the other one moved toward the other.

content.detailedDescription: On 5/14/2010, at approximately 10:15 pm, i left my workplace. i drove approx 1/4 mile to the east, to a convenience store to buy a six pack of beer. i paid for six pack, walked out side, got in my car, and as i was pulling out of the parking lot onto the public street, i looked up and saw these two, large pinkish/red solid lights, flying across the sky. they were emitting a directional light. when i first saw them come out of the southeastern sky, they appeared to be traveling from south to north, and that is when the light emitting from them was the brightest. i pulled across the street into a large mall type parking lot to get a better veiw. i picked up my cell phone and called my place of work where there were other coworkers still there. i told them to go outside and look up at the southern sky. i am not sure if the lights turned or just moved across the sky. but they ended up traveling in a westward direction. i was on the  cell phone with my coworkers who were standing in the parking lot, 1/4 mile from me, watching the event. there were 5 of them. three women, age's 29 to 44. and two men ages 17 and 20. i began driving toward the lights, on the street, and ended up in front of, but across the street from my place of work, with the coworkers standing out side watching the lights. as the lights moved across the sky, the light being emitted from them began to fade, not as in fading from moving farther away, but fading as in the lights were shinning ahead of the two craft. and, it could have been one large craft with a light at each end. the distance between the two lights, was, at arms length, in my vield of view, 5 to 6 inches apart when they were directly due south from me as they moved across the sky. in other words, if i held up a ruler at the end of my arm, the lights would have been 5 to 6 inches apart. as they traveled away to the west, the angle changed as if they were attached to one large object. the lights did not flicker, they did not pulse, they did not strobe. during the event, a commercial jet, apparently flying out of memphis int airport flew over the lights, from west to east.  the commercial jet was 4 or 5 times higher in altitude than the lights. the lights finally disappeared to the west,but, the west leading light disapeared maybe 15 or 20 seconds before the rear light. it was a clear night and there were stars out. when i first noticed the object, my first impulse was that it was a helicopter. it was low and moving slow. there was no sound. i turned my car engine off. there was very limited trafic in the area. the movement of the object, was very steady. it did not appear to change altitude. my feelings were that i was actually witnessing a ufo event. at first, i went through the deductive process of what it could be. and then, i realized, it was nothing that i could identify. i had no specific emotion, no fear, some excitement. my coworkers on the phone, however, were doing the "oh my gosh" thing. they did not freak out, but they could not believe what they were seeing. i have spent alot of time, over the years, watching the sky. i am pretty familiar with most of what is up there visible to the naked eye. each night, while at work, when i take a break, i go outside and look up at the sky. just in case there is something i need to see. this immediatly reminded me of the phoenix lights incident. i am a very logical solid person. i am college educated and a professional. i dont jump to snap conclusions.
content.summary: Two solid pinkish/red large lights traveling southeast to southwest in the southern sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching tv when i noticed something bright moving in the sky.  i went to the window to see what it was. at first i thought it was a plane with the running lights on, but it stopped moving and got super bright, then dimmed down.  i grabbed my binoculars to get a closer look at it. through them, i could make out a pyramid shape, red and blue in color.  i got excited and called a friend to see if he could see it from his place; he went outside but couldn't see it; he told me to take pics of it, which i did.  i took about 8 pictures with my work phone.  it was in the w-n-w sky, quite high up.  i talked to him the entire time i was watching it.  it just blinked out, gone.
   after it left, i was looking at the pictures and noticed that upon zooming in on the object, i could make out some sort of windows on the right side of it. this was repeated in the other pictures as well. there is also dimmer lights on the left side and below it, pyramid style.  zoomed in, you can make out reflection on left side, but the bottom light is strange.  perfectly square, and riddled with shapes and x's throughout the square.      
   it came back the next night around 8:46 pm.Same place.  i was watching for it, hoping that it would return.  i took pictures this night as well. it stayed there almost 2 hours.
    one week later,may 5, i saw it again, same place, around 9 pm.  my daughter was visiting, and she noticed it first. she asked me if i knew what that bright light was in the sky.  i got up and looked, and sure enough, it was back. it stayed around only about 45 minutes this time. but, there were other lights up there this time. they couldn't be seen without the binoculars, there were 2 other things(?) up there. they  had flashing lights, but were extremely high up. 
i keep watching, but haven't seen it since.
i have no way of attaching the pictures to this report, but have them saved.
content.summary: Bright light flashes in the sky, becoming stationary for over an hour, two nights in a row.

content.detailedDescription: Im not [cms/tg/pd] crazy, i know what a saw. i cant tell you the exact date. but i was in bryan/tx and i was standing outside of my apartments. and im just standing the taking the dog out. and i stop to look up at the sky as i often do. and i saw sosomethinghat stood out. it was just this orange i wanna say ball but thing. it was like this glowing ball of orange light like just hovering there like you know a helicopter would. and im just staring at it. just not wanting to take my eyes off of it because it was so curious. just not moving in the sky at all. i remember thinking whwheres camera or a recorder when you need one and i wanted to go inside to grab one but i dididn'tecause i wanted so bad to watch it. cuz ive never seen anything like it. but what makes me say ufo and not mimilitary tec was because. after about 6 or 7 minutes of it just sitting there not moving, it just shot off just faster then any thing i have ever seen in like a ststraightiline kinda dirirectly away from me but at an angle. it just in a matter of 2 maby 3 seconds it just didisappeare didnt go neccicaraly up but mor just out and away. so fast. i lived near a milatary base at that time so i dont really know. but. for it to hover like that. and then shoot off. never seen anything like that. and my uncle flew black hawks. they dont move like that. i was a sceptic. still kinda am but after seing that. leves so many questions you know.
content.summary: Orange disk or sphere bright. not pulsating hovering then moved fast.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving from eugene to portland on i-5 and was just south of salem when i noticed a bright light in the sky. i assumed it was a planet at first, but then i realized it appeared larger as i continued to drive in its direction. as far as i could tell it was not moving. as i got closer it appeared to be a glowing white sphere that was hovering completely still directly above the freeway. i soon saw 2 more in the distance, one of which was visible to the west until i was almost in portland. a few miles after the first white one i saw a dimmer red sphere with a smaller flashing red light on one side. then in the distance i saw what i thought was an airplane, but as i got closer i realized it wasn't moving either. i saw to red lights and one green one. the green one slowly disappeared, and i realized the object appeared to be rotating very slowly. 

i know that the mcminnville ufo festival is going on right now, so i wondered if this had anything to do with that, but these seemed to be quite large and high in the sky, not something an amateur prankster could pull off. 

i haven't been able to find any mention of any aircrafts or any other floating or flying objects around salem tonight in the news or on twitter.Hundreds of people must have seen them. they were very clearly visible from the road. anyone know what they were?
content.summary: At least 5 objects of varying shapes and colors over i-5 near salem.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 10:30 pm i noticed a bright, star-like object that was stationary in the sky to the northwest of sharon, pa. from where i saw it this would put it over trumbull county, oh.  at first thought, i was wondering if it might be venus but it seemed larger than that and i know venus does not appear in the northwest sky.  in addition, the light had an occasional flicker as if it were a star. i thought, though, that the flicker might be coming from twigs at the tops of trees that may not have been readily apparent in the night sky from whewe i was seeing the light. i became curious and decided to try to get a better view so i headed west from where i was and headed to downtown sharon, pa.  once in the downtown area, the object appeared as what can be described in terms of size and brightness as an outside incandescent porch light of a house that would be about 4/10 of a mile away from where i was. the lighted object appeared just above the tree line at the top of the west hill area of sharon, pa.  at this point i knew what i was seeing was something unusual because it was low in the sky and there were no blinking red, white, or blue lights surrounding it that would indicate some type of commercial or private human aircraft.  i decided i wanted to get a better look, so i proceeded through the downtown area and out the northwest side of town in the direction of the light. i had lost sight of the object for a little while until i got to an area of high ground on route 846 where the light would occasionally disappear behind trees on the west side of the highway. by now the light seemed that it was more above me rather than so much in the distance and appeared to have a more yellowish cast. i continued to search for more open space so turned left and the next main intersection and headed west into trumbull county, oh. there are alot of wooded areas in the area i was in so i was searching for more open farm fields well into trumbull county to get a better view.  there were large gaps between visuals of the light because of the trees but managed to get my best view while on route 305 about 2 to 3 miles west of hartford center.  however, by this time the object had moved quite a distance to the northwest heading in a northwestterly direction.  at this point, although still quite large and yet at a greater distance away the object appeared more yellowish-orange and more pulsating.  i continued to pursue while on route 305 until lost sight of object behind the distant trees to the northwest of route 11. this is where i ended my chase believing that i was not going to catch up to it and it was already about 11 pm.
content.summary: See detail.

content.detailedDescription: Went out to south porch of house to relieve myself after me and my partner got done watching a tv program. i looked up to the sky to enjoy the bright clear starlight night and as i changed my point of view from straight-up to nw view immediatly noticed a large bright star object moving from nw to se, thinking it was possibly a satelite i called for my partner to witness what i saw, when she got from the couch to the south porch the object stopped, dropped straight down and behind a tree line. she was scared and went back inside, i was curious and walked to the south portion of the property and saw the same object moving slowly down then suddenly, in a flash, move back to the nw position, almost exactly where i first saw it. from there it seemed to change colors and move left, right and up, down for a short while before it eventualy dropped down out of sight.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Very bright object moving first from nw to se then changed flight path(down) and quickly back to nw position where it

content.detailedDescription:
my outfit (a marine hawk missile battalion) had been setting up camp on the beach near chu lai, which is about 25 miles southwest of danang. i was assigned a machine gun emplacement (we had to provide our own defense). it was about 5 or 6 in the evening. there were a series of long and quite tall sand dunes at our back and our machine gun emplacement was at the end and on top of one of these dunes.I had my rifle over my shoulder,just waiting for my men to show up and man the bunker. was standing looking across this field toward where the woods began (in between two dunes).  all at once i noticed a black speck at about a 23 degree (approximate) angle from the ground. it grew larger and larger and never wavered from that angle until it seemed to be a black sphere, about a mile or two away. it was about the size (at that distance) of a dime but of course,from that distance it could have really been quite large...I estimate about 20 feet or so in actual diameter.
     it just set there for about 2-3 minutes, then it seemed (slowly to move away, at that same 23 degree angle. when it stopped and hovered i thought about shooting at it with my m-14 rifle, but i thought, well, what if it shoots back or whatever.  i was not scared but fascinated.
        i thought about reporting it to my c.O., but i did not want him to think i had lost my mind or that i was trying to get out of my wartime service.
         i don't know of any devices or aircraft that could make the moves this object made...Not even a helicopter could move in such a way, in my opinion.
       i have done some research, and the only similar incident reportedly happened in germany in the 1600's, at which time, folks reported seeing multiple black spheres, but i do not remember what the article said about how such spheres behaved.
  unfortunately, i had no cameras at that time.
content.summary: Preparing for guard duty. looked across  a field towards beginning of woods. a black speck appeared...Grew into sphere..Hovered for a while then backed away and vanished

content.detailedDescription: I was out taking pics of some unusual looking chem clouds. i didn't notice anything in the sky until i look a the pics. i don't know what they are but we have had a lot of ufo sightings here in phoenix az.
content.summary: sun set with unusual clouds

content.detailedDescription:
Another superfast, large white orb.  no sound and hauling a**.


went out on the south facing deck to smoke a butt.  my wife was there first and taps me on the thigh and says "there's another one".  pointing to the southwest.  a large white "ball" about 1.5 to 2 times the size of jupiter is  making a ese trajectory and hauling the usual a** (note the headline).  the duration of sight by both of us was around 15 seconds and covered a little more than a third of the horizon, only to be lost in the treeline of our yard (probably a 38 degree pitch looking due south).

we were so disappointed that we do not have a digital camera to record this.  doesn't happen all the time, but it is seen enough... and not just 1.  plus the speed is such that one would have to be up on it instantly with the camera because of the speed.
content.summary: Twice as large as jupiter and crosses the sky at jet speed x 4

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching a movie on my computer that i have hooked up to my tv in the living room. it was late, so i was very sleepy. all of the sudden my tv went stone black. a big bright light flashed through my living room, very slowly. i jumped up from my couch and walked over to the window thinking it was another failed russian missile like the one i saw last year on my way to work. it was very bright, so bright that in at first i couldn't see anything, because the light was blinding me. then it moved over to the building on my left and started flashing lights into my neighbors apartment. that's when i thought of getting my camera, i ran into my bedroom and got it. i wasn't able to turn it on,none of my electronics worked until 20 minutes after it was gone. it continued to flash a bright light into at least 7 more apartments, as far as i know. sort of looked like it was searching for something, maybe ever scanning the apartments. it didn't make any noise at all. the light was almost like the ones you see on lighthouses, only it had a hint of red and was much brighter.
the object itself was a slim triangle, with 4 "spikes". three on top, one very small under where the source of the light was coming from. seemed like if it was landing somewhere, that triangular "spike" had to connect to something or else it would break from my point of view. it had the color of metal, i say metal because the surface reminded me of a toaster. but at the front of the ufo wasn't spiked, it looked like if you cut the tip of a carrot of. 
i tried to open my door to the veranda, just as i opened the door the light turned to me. i was terrified. then it flew right over my building without even making a sound. i ran out my front door, but it was gone.

in the attachments i have added a sketch of the object.
content.summary: 2 am, norway. i saw a bright light. thought it was another russian missile, was wrong

content.detailedDescription:
This case was imputed by morgan beall, mufon field investigator 12273. spoke to case number 23268s father. primary witness was a air force pilot for the majority of his life and has never seen anything like it.


spoke to primary witness who witnessed a object at cape canaveral beach in 1964 with a date. described it as a steel ball like a steal barring. it had two rings one horizontal the other vertical. color of the rings were yellow green fuzzy  color. at arms length the object was about the size of a tennis ball.

he noticed the object due to the silence that occurred at the beach area. looked up and saw the described object. all the people on the beach area were all silent and starring at the object. the object then took off straight up in seconds. the primary witness then described the reaction of the people on the beach as not alarmed but were described as zombie like and all of them began to walk out of the beach area, get in their cars and leave. even a vendor attached his cart to his vehicle and calmly got in his vehicle and drove off. ray and his date followed soon after.
content.summary: Saw a chrome sphere with yellow green rings above us at the beach north of the cape.

content.detailedDescription:
This sighting had 3 witness total. 

it was a strange event. my friend and i were outside on the landing of my second story stairs. we were both outside. it was night time and there were a few clouds scattered. it was dark in our location. you could see the silhouette of the barn/ garage outside and the tree line adjescent to the local main strip, which was located just beyond the trees and out of view. you could see some stars in the sky while looking out over the yard from our height. we were outside having a cigarette, to keep the smoke away from the kids inside the house. my friend was facing me with their back not facing the barn/ garage. not facing the tree line. i was taking a drag of my cigarette and because of the distance my friend was from me, i exhaled the smoke up toward the sky. while doing so, i sighted a cluster/ group of ufo's (approximately 6-8) gather above the garage/ barn. in my bewilderment i asked my friend "what are those?" "what isss that?" she turned around and "i don't know, what is it?" we both excitedly looked on as the cluster hovered above the barn for a few seconds. they were obviously not that far overhead. they were doing a "dance" of sort. very controlled. they moved on ahead in the sky, which took them to above the tree line. (silhouetted) at this point the cluster of ufo's again paused their traveling and did that funky dance again. the dance looked as if they were exchanging spots. each individual craft was approximately the size of one of the small box cars people drive around. there was no noise at all. they were internally illuminated at the bottom of each craft, not bright at all, no light coming down or outward from the craft. just a slight illumination, a self illumination of a melted silver/ off white color. i myself, personally noticed a shadowing of the tops of each craft, to me it looked as if it were colored a dark bronze black mix. barely noticable. anyhow, as they paused the second time, i called for my kid inside and rushed them to come out to experience this before the crafts may disappear. my kid did witness the last few seconds of the sighting. we all seen the same thing. the experience amazed the lot of us. we all drew pictures of the sighting and all came out with the same dipiction of the sighting. we had no other explaination for the sighting. we thought, balloons, but balloons dont act controlled or stop in mid air. we all thought maybe aircraft, but no noise at all. the motions that the ufo's made a conventional plane could not do. ball lightning, but they did not flash or boom. whatever it was, it was definately an odd experience, exciting, exhilerating (to me) and i wish i could see them again. i have had other sightings before. as well as the witness's. thank you for listening and look up, you would be suprized at what you might see from time to time.
content.summary: A cluster/ group of unusual flying objects.

content.detailedDescription:
The montreal canadians just won the east quarter finals of the stanley cup series against pittsburg (against all odds), everybody (a lot of people!) was outside celebrating and having fun. then i (and a friend) saw what seemed like airplane lights coming from the north west to us about 45 deg elevation over the buildings. then it stopped (gradually), so we thought its a helicopter with a weird orange light...Then another 2 of these crafts appeared from the north, slowly joined the other light, then a couple of minutes later, another two. they all disappeared going slowly to the west.

 had these been helicopters, the sound would have been pretty loud, and 5 like helicopters hovering over montreal at the same time, even the canadian army does not blow money this way. these were no flares, i know what a flare looks like (they parachute for one thing, and they smoke like hell too). these ufos were steady in altitude. it really looked like somebody was observing the people celebrating outside, just like a police helicopter would, but five silent police helicopters in montreal ?
the montreal police doesn't even own one. 

the light was orange and flickering, not like navigation lights, larger and sort of fuzzy.

i know a guy filed a video with youtube, what he descibes is different from what i saw by the number of ufos, and maybe the color, white on the video, orange in my observation. but the timing and general appearance is the same.

what's odd is that on the same evening (and i just found out now as i surfed the net for other reports of may 12) that the sci-fi channel in the us was talking about a mass sighting in montreal in 1990 (which i've never heard about until now). odd.

[cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Orange flickering light, 3 groups: 1 ufo then 2, then another 2 joined

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i went out for a walk from our home at 9:10 p.M. thursday may 13th 2010.  we left the house and walked to the driveway where we have a clear view of the eastern sky.  it was then that we saw an extrememly bright red/orange sphere 1/3 the size of a full moon moving very slowly in the sky directly in front of us. the object was on a straight line course sse and after approx. 1 minute changed to a se course until it eventually dissapeared from our view.
the object did not make any sound and did not have any strobe beacons or landing lights.  i work at a major airport and have a very good idea of what aircraft look like in flight.
the night sky was partly cloudy but the object was not passing through them.  shortly after the sighting a small single engine craft flew over us on a nne course and was intermittently obscured by the clouds.  also the sound of the engine was clearly heard and the strobes clearly visible.  to us this meant that the unknown object was flying below approx. 2000 feet and was not an aircraft of any type known to us.  the object was moving at less than half the speed of the single engine craft.
when i first saw the object my initial reaction was that it was a ufo.

once we got over the excitement of the moment we continued on our walk.  a block from the house we ran into a neighbor walking her dog.  she appeared excited and asked if we had just seen something strange in the sky.  she had described the exact object we had seen.
content.summary: Red/orange sphere moving slowly

content.detailedDescription:
Around 6:45am i was getting my kids ready for school when i noticed from my kitchen window a beautiful rainbow colored ring around the outermost edges of the sun. about 6 minutes later i had very strong nudge suggest i get my camera phone and take some pictures of this. which i did. while i was reviewing the photos i saw the bright orb slighty above the sun. i showed my husband the pictures. he was confident that there is a logical explanation for the orb in the pictures. if someone could tell me i would like to know what it is.  

i think it's important to mention that i was about to dismiss the whole thing as some kind of natural phenomenon, when i felt for a second time i felt a very strong nudged to go outside and take more pictures. as if to reconfirm for me that which i was beginning to doubt. if you look closely to the picture taken at 7:16.08 you will notice the orb just passing in front of the sun on the bottom right. the other photos show the orbs path. i could not see the orb with the naked eye. i just held out the camera in the direction of the sun and took the pictures with my eyes looking down. i have other photos that i took of my own direction and they do not show anything unusual. i felt really excited i was looking and asking for some personal conformation.  i've had some interesting encounters but i've always been able to discredit the experience in my mind. this gives me something tangable.  charity
content.summary: Large luminous orb

content.detailedDescription: My friends father and two children were in their yard and saw a very large object very high in the sky.One of the children was the first to spot the object who in turn pointed the object out to the grandfather and other child.Children were frightened and the grandfather who has been in  the airforce did not have an explanation for the rather large object covered with lights.He said he "had not seen anything that big or fast before with so many lights".After they saw the object the children were very frightened and went inside.The next morning one the children woke to tell a story of being visited by two of the pilots of said object.The grndfather said that the object was very high and was flying at great speed and was "huge".
content.summary: 1 grown man 2 small children witnessed the event

content.detailedDescription:
while talking on the phone in my screenroom i observed north of my location a c-130 (grey color-military i assume) pursuing a small bright object, both traveling west to east, maybe the east southeast.  c-130's fly over almost every night.  usually in pairs.  they had already flown over from west to east earlier in the evening, at approx. 20:00 hrs.  but this single aircraft was going much faster than the usual flyovers.
  about 1-2 seconds ahead of the c-130 was a very small, very bright object traveling in a perfect straight line.  the speed varied, very fast, then slower, it repeated this pattern across the entire skyline: fast/slower, fast/slower.  even at the slower speed the 2 were flying very fast!  the c-130 was traveling at a constant speed.  in my opinion the c-130 was close to being maxed out in speed and manueverability.  after all it is a cargo plane.
  the small bright object veered toward the right (south) as it neared the eastern horizon.  as did the aircraft in pursuit.  they both disappeared into clouds.  i could not see any details on the bright object, it was too small, and too bright.  the 2 were north of new providence, maybe over willow street, and strasburg.  maybe over route 30.  then probably chester county, pa.
  the object was under intelligent control.  the brightness varied i think with the speed.  there was no exhaust or vapor trail.  the bright light was constant, no variation.  first i thought it was a meteorite but it had no trail, no sparks or smoke, and didn't head toward the ground, it traveled parallel to the ground.  the object was very small compared to the c-130.  if it wasn't so bright the object may have been impossible to see.  the plane was at least 75-maybe as much as 100- times bigger.  the whole thing happened in just a minute or so.
  the weather was partly cloudy, with a 5-10 mph southeast wind. i emailed the local tv station (wgal 8), and got no response.  i don't know if anyone else saw this.  it's hard to believe no one saw it, the object was so bright.  with a big military plane in pursuit.  it wasn't swamp gas, or a weather balloon i know that!

respectfully submitted;
[cmsw/tg/pid]
content.summary: Object chased by c-130

content.detailedDescription:
I am writing to notify you that i may have had another encounter. two nights ago myself and two other friends went sky watching out in the boonies. at one point we saw a three light formation very distant on the horizon through binoculars. we all got really spooked. while driving out i was in the back seat looking into the fields. i noticed a bight object on the ground and we all got scared and my friend hit the gas. on the way back towards highway 82 the object seemed to get brighter and lift off the ground. we hauled ass and finally got to the highway and i remembered we had a video camera so i convinced my friend to go back so i could get it on film. it felt like it took forever to get back to the highway but the distance back to the object seemed much much shorter. we finally got back to it and parked in front of it. we all saw a bright white light casting a glow on the ground directly to the right of a dramatically smaller seemingly reddish light.
 to the left there appears to mabye be an even smaller light close to the ground moving around. throughout this experience the lights brightned dimmed turned off turned on and even multiplied and we have this all on film. when the lights multiplied we got the he'll out if there and i managed to film it as we were leaving and the object seemed to actually pace us because it neither grew smaller or more dim as we high tailed it out if there. i can't exactly remember what happened next but i remember when we finally got away the object was completely elsewhere. i have some freeze frame stills from the original footage that i will email you but to get the full scenario i will try to convert in the next day or so. the original footage was shot with a sony mini tape recorder type camera. basically a mini-vhs. we recorded a copy to vhs and took frame samples from them. the pictures i'm about to send only cover a minor detail of the whole event so as soon as i  make a digital copy i'll email that to you as well. i don't own or possess the original but if my friend consents to being contacted then you will have access to the original. 

on another note,

today my massouse noticed a scar on the small of my back that i can't account for. i haven't had any kind of cuts or anything there and the only time i can honestly remember having that kind of pain is when i went to st louis to my ex girlfriends and woke up with the pain in my back and conciously observed the "entity" in the door way. i'm still not sure what to make of all of this. i can't sleep, i'm terrified of being alone, especially at night and i never feel alone. i always feel like i'm being watched or there is someone near me. i stay at work after hours to get caught up and ive heard un accountable shuffling noises, grunts and coughs and moving objects. i have no clue what they are or what's causing them but i am honestly in constant fear nowadays. i thought about going to a psychiatrist to get it off my chest but they probably wouldn't take me seriously and wind up doping me up on prozac or something. please see what you can make if this mess,  it's driving me nuts! thank you and i really appreciate your efforts!
content.summary: 2 friends and myself went for a ride when we gaqme across a ufo.  we left immediatly but returned when i remembered the video camera.

content.detailedDescription:
My then boyfriend worked in golden, b.C. as a security guard for a construction site. he only worked nights so i would visit him and we'd lay
on the roof of this building and star gaze. 

one night around 3am, we both heard an abrupt clapping sound and a few feet from where i was originally staring at brick red triangle appeared out of nowhere. it wasn't shining like a light but it was glowing and was a definite burgundy/brick red color. this thing looked exactly like a stealth bomber and was flying around the same level as a common bird would fly. it wasn't too high (or at least didn't look like it was), it seemed pretty close (or it was rather large but quite a distance away). anyways, this thing was flying with the peak of the triangle in the direction it was flying, and the left and right points were almost parallel with the ground and sky. i would say it was leaning at a 70 degree angle if that makes any sense! as soon as it appeared it slowly moved across the nights sky at such an abnormal pace.. too slow for a plane, too fast for a bird.. after 5 seconds of this it there were two of them.. and it looked as if there was another one right behind it so perfectly aligned that we couldn't tell that there were two, but this thing up and infront of the original pretty quickly and instantaneously they started doing rapid coordinated flight patterns. the best way to describe it would be the light from a flash light, if someone were to wave their arms around frantically, the light would be jumping around in a violent, jerky way yet both of them remained flying together, the perfect distance apart. this lasted for 3 seconds and they stopped abruptly, flew parallel next to each other and continued the original pace for 5 seconds or so and then disappeared into the sky, not behind a tree or anything.. but disappeared from our eyes from the nights sky.. and without a sound unlike when it first appeared! this ufo flight didn't take utilize too much space either, if you were to outstretch your arms it would be a 2 foot span from your perspective in the sky.
content.summary: Strange brick red stealth bomber-esque ufo in golden

content.detailedDescription:
I was out for a walk late at night around 230am on a country road near my house.

i looked up when i saw what was a shooting star, as i looked up i realized what was up there was much bigger and much closer than a shooting star.. and it continued to glow. i stared up at it and it didn't seem like it was very high up at all above me maybe only 100ft. but if it was only 100 ft in the air then it couldn't have been much larger than a big beach ball.

it moved in short but fast bursts with no sound kind of like how a squid moves through the water.

the sphere glided right over my head and in about 15-20 seconds it sped off quickly behind a small hill.

it seems lame but i swear i got the feeling it was looking at me.
content.summary: Bright white sphere cruising over head

content.detailedDescription: We arrived at home at approximately 9:00pm on friday may 7th to find one of our neighbors out on the sidewalk very excited and urging us to come over quickly to her and verify that she wasn't seeing things.  she immediately had us look up to the sky to west and we witnessed two very bright orange glowing objects that were traveling in a southernly direction.  the objects traveled for a few seconds and then stopped still.  i ran into the apartment to get my binoculars and came out to scope these objects out.  they were hard to make out much detail other than they were very bright and glowed orange.  i was not real steady with the binoculars and could not really see any defined body shape. after a few minutes one of the objects just disappeared from where it was stopped.  the other object stayed in place and then it disappeared.  my neighbor said she counted nine of the objects when she first noticed them and after a few minutes one or two of the objects would disappear and this went on until we arrived on the scene with only two of the objects remaining. my neighbor indicated that they traveled to the east and then back to the west and then went in the southern direction after we arrived.  we tried to determine what they might have been.  they were not aircraft, fireworks, weather balloons, meteors, and they made no sound whatsoever.  they were nothing that we had ever seen before. upon first viewing these things the hair on the back of my neck was standing straight out and my heart rate was high as i had never experienced anything like this before.  we kept looking for them to reappear but never saw them again. an interesting note was that i told my father about them and he said he was driving home from a friends house at about the exact same time and he said that he spotted two of these objects as well and could not figure out what they were either.  it was twilight with some daylight remaining but with venus showing clearly as the brightest star in the sky.  these objects were much larger than any possible star, plus moving and glowing orange all the while until they disappeared
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Roundish radiating bright orange glowing orbs

content.detailedDescription:
My wife had gone to bed early. (8:30-9:00pm) she called me to the bedroom saying there was a light in the sky.  i went upstairs (we live in a tri-level home, facing west on high ground with open space behind us affording us an excellent view of the front range) and saw a bright star like object.  the object was west of my home at approximately the one o'clock position, high in the sky. i looked at it through my telescope. (meade ng 60ar with a 9mm eyepiece) the object was white and larger and brighter than objects normally viewed from my bedroom.  viewed through the telescope the object pulsed, changing colors blue and orange/red.  there was no discernable shape.  the object was stationary.  i viewed it for several minutes.  i told my wife i thought it may be a celestial object and atmospheric conditions may be causing the color changes. (ever being the skeptic) she continued to watch the object while i returned to the living room.  thirty minutes (approx) later, she called out that the object "just disappeared".  i returned to the bedroom and saw indeed, the object was no longer visible.
i checked the western sky every few minutes after that.  approximately thirty to forty minutes later i saw a similar object low in the western sky, (approx four o'clock) further north than the first sighting, possibly in the general direction of boulder.  my wife called out at the same time that she too was seeing the object.  
i went upstairs and looked at the object through my telescope.  this object was much closer than the first.  it occupied more of the field of view that the first object.  i could not discern a definitive shape but, i saw a row of lights on the bottom.  they pulsed down the length, left to right changing colors as it went. (red, orange, white, blue-not in that particular order) there appeared to be a second, less discernable row of pulsing light above the other row.  this gave the object a slight unfinished "e" look.
the object then began to give off a circular faint white corona that slowly pulsed.  this white light corona pulsed three or four times then the object just "blinked out".  i had viewed this second object for about ten minutes before it blinked out.
approximately a half hour later a third object appeared in the western sky.  this object appeared similar to the first object but it was higher in the sky (near twelve o'clock) and because of its size viewed through the telescope it seemed to be further west.  i watched the object continually through the telescope for nearly thirty minutes.  it was moving slowly to the west.  it moved on a flat, straight line trajectory
until it had traveled out of my telescopes view.  it did not "set" being the mountains like a celestial object.  those objects travel from top to bottom in the field of view of the telescope.  this object did not do that.  based on the high altitude of the object it is possible it was near utah when i lost sight of it.
this entire episode lasted from approximately 8:30pm until approximately 10:30pm.
content.summary: My wife and i saw three seperate objects/events.  viewed at an unknown distance/altitude in the western sky.

content.detailedDescription: My husband called me and told me to go outside and look at the sky,i was inside my house cooking so i went outside and i saw what looked liked a cigar floating in the sky, my husband states that he saw it around 1 pm today and it is now 3 o'clock and is still up in the sky, it seems to change colors, it's black but it also looks like silver. it looks flexible. i could not believe it, some people calculate that it might be the size of a football field.
content.summary: It looked like a cigar and it was black and silver.

content.detailedDescription:
Stopped at exit 59 off i-75 ga.(love's truckstop) while walking nw to the
building a flash of light to the west attracted my attention. the object was approx. 2 to 4 miles west and perhaps at 4000' in altitude. it was traveling due north. the object was silver and was reflecting the morning sun. it also appeared to be tumbling as the flashes were irregular in frequency and duration. the object was visible between the flashes and although i could not determine a definate physical shape it could have been triangular. after about 45 seconds the object turned to the nw and shortly after went out of visual range.
content.summary: Flashing object

content.detailedDescription:
That winter was wierd..Along with the comet that had been visible by eye we all (in town too) we bagn to see large (relative to stars) lights hanging in the sky toward yuma.  friends one night videoed them b/c it was at suk..Other times it would be later.... my husband could see them many nights on the drive along the maricopa highway toward out place on vekol wash and papago roads.

one moonless night i took my kids out in the desert on a dirt road about three miles toward the lights, it was moonless and after about ten minutes of realizing we were all alone out there we were suddenly gripped with fear and headed home!  the lights were no more "readable" at that distance, so they must have been far away.  they were most often seen about 10-40 degress off the horizon and visible as soon as the sun began to set.
 
we all tried to come up with military explanations - research flare technology..Could these be hanging flares or something so bright so far away?  they often seemed in formation, like a huge arc, so we assumed somehow the flares were tied together or something. these lights would eventually "go away" - or just dissapear and se we thought perhaps the flares just extinguish?

 however, sometimes there would be a whole "string" of lights and others just one..Or two, and there was movement between them...So flares with little heliocopter motors we thought!  that winter was acoompanied by a lot of jet fly over - some in town thought a war was brewing it was so hightened and that there must be war games or something at the airforce base toward yuma....

of course the following year the phoenix lights were witnessed by many and it was very similar to what we were seeing maricopa and in the sonoran - around ak-chin rez.....

why report now ten years later?  i just saw the very thoughful documentary "i know what i saw" and feel like information... even this which seems so basically "nothing"  is mounting and perhaps somewhere this will be explained.  i will check to see if i took video or any photos.  i do recall we got a small telescope set up to try and see better...But again just huge round lights... no smoke or any flare type signs though.....  i recall the name of the person who did take video in town...I had pulled in their house on the way home, exclaiming...They were already in backyard filming! it was a vhs camcorder if i recall - so perhaps the quality no better than the hundreds of "lights" video.

in the end we could never see a solid body or craft...Just these amazing lights...  in total we witnessed this perhaps two dozen times over that winter...From about christmas to march or so....

i moved that summer and missed the phoenix lights thing the next year...Except what was reported.
content.summary: Multiple witnesses and evenings when multiple "lights" would collect in the sw sky (toward yuma)..
